```{r fig.width=7.5}
library(ahead)

y <- USAccDeaths

(obj1 <- ahead::glmthetaf(y, h=15L, fit_func=gam::gam, attention=TRUE))

(obj6 <- ahead::glmthetaf(y, h=15L, fit_func=glm, attention=FALSE))



plot(obj1)
plot(obj6)
```
